resource: 1003189.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003189.vtc=true 1003189.description=These lights turn on when the engine switch is turned to the "ON" position (vehicles without a smart key system) or the "POWER" switch is turned to ON mode (vehicles with a smart key system) to indicate that a system check is being performed. They will turn off after the hybrid is started, or after a few seconds. There maybe a malfunction in a system if a light does not come on, or if the lights do not turn off. Have vehicle inspected by your Toyota dealer for details.
